text: Levy Patrick Mwanawasa (September 3, 1948 â€“ August 19, 2008) was a Zambian politician and lawyer. He was the President of Zambia from January 2002, until his death of a stroke in 2008. == References == Category:1948 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Presidents of Zambia Category:Vice-presidents of Zambia Category:Zambian lawyers Category:Deaths from stroke
